promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple butterfly grass-type pokemon with green runic wings. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Runiclutter, a a chibi young simple butterfly grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Cloak Scale, Chomp. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "grass" or "Runiclutter". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, butterfly-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This petite flutterbug thrives in wooded realms, using Cloak Scale to blend with foliage and Chomp to nibble on leaves for sustenance.
